body_html: Just as a comment: there is some experimental support for session.partial_run() in TensorFlow in the 0.7 release. Since partial_run does not deallocate the tensors, it should make step-by-step decoding from seq2seq models much easier. And since we can have a few of them in parallel, it could also greatly simplify beam_search. But it's experimental for now, so beware - I'm just testing it.

body: Just as a comment: there is some experimental support for session.partial_run() in TensorFlow in the 0.7 release. Since partial_run does not deallocate the tensors, it should make step-by-step decoding from seq2seq models much easier. And since we can have a few of them in parallel, it could also greatly simplify beam_search. But it's experimental for now, so beware - I'm just testing it.
